name: Beso Amoroso
description: Lanzas un beso a una criatura, intentando inducirla en un profundo sueño. El objetivo debe realizar una tirada de salvación de Carisma contra tu CD de Movimiento, quedando dormido si falla.

effect.name: Makes the audience quickly grow bored when an appeal move has little effect.
effect.effect: Moves that get 2 Appeal points or less do not increase the crowd meter until the end of your next turn.
